Topic.Title: Quest on the web - create games on Windows, Mac, Linux, iPad

Posts.EditableText:
The web-based version of Quest is now in public beta.

[url=http://www.textadventures.co.uk/blog/2012/03/14/quest-on-the-web-public-beta-preview/:p2z3xajo]Read all about it on the blog[/url:p2z3xajo] or just [url=http://www.textadventures.co.uk/create/:p2z3xajo]go ahead and start using it![/url:p2z3xajo]
Posts.HTML:
The web-based version of Quest is now in public beta.

Read all about it on the blog or just go ahead and start using it!
